title: Hi Riot
body:
Just thought of another cool skin idea. Inspiration came from Naruto Shippuden and there is a person named “Garra”, if you don’t know who he is, I highly recommend searching him. He has a massive Gourd that sand emmits from and I think this would be great for Singed! I know he has a new skin already but this idea just came to my thoughts. Could name Sand keeper Singed or Sand Guardian Singed. His Q can just be sand coming out of him and his W could be like a sand pit or quicksand. Would love to hear some responses! Thanks for your time!

Kind regards,

Xenomazul

replies.body: Does Garra laugh or bm? I think not.
I am sure Riot can work out the emotes and stuff after they look at him.
